ComicInfo.Summary:
Part 5 of the 7-part "Red Harvest." How did a human Samurai become a lethal assassin working for the Green? We finally learn the origin of Kudzu, the vine-covered warrior whose been tracking Tefé since issue #6. Also, the strange connection between the DDI director and Tefé's past is revealed.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-11-19 06:51:40. [Issue ID 48329]
